SEPEDA THRILL 29 RAVAGE ELITE MTB 29INCH GUNUNG

Frame (Bahan Rangka) : Alloy Internal Cable, Fork (Garpu Depan) : Rockshock Judy TR-R Boost TA 100mm Remote Lockout, Shifter (Pengoper Gigi) : Shimano Deore XT SL-M8000 1 x 11 Speed, Rear Derailleur (Pemindah Gigi Belakang) : Shimano Deore XT SL-M8000 11 Speed, Crankset (Poros Engkol) : Alloy 170mm 32T, Bottom Bracket (As Engkol) : Hollowtech, Cassette (Gigi Belakang) : 11-46, Pedal : Alloy.
